## MRLipidInfection
This is a package where I am trying out Mendelian Randomisation techniques.

## Installation
You can install the latest version of MRLipidInfection in R using:
```{r installation, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("nicksunderland/MRLipidInfection")
```

Please see the "Articles" tab. https://nicksunderland.github.io/MRLipidInfection/
